content: - 7 -   resolution issues and to maintaining strong cooperation between home and host   supervisors during normal and crisis periods.   I will close by observing that the international effort to strengthen financial   regulation cannot succeed unless each nation understands the goals and challenges faced   by its partners.  The Federal Reserve and the Bundesbank have a long history.  I believe   there is a trust between us that is the basis for collaboration.  I look forward to working   with you to make the financial system safer and stronger.   Thank you.
